00009 Float_t ORBocTIC3Decoder::GetPressureOfChannel(UInt_t* record, UInt_t channel) 
00010 {
00011   if (channel >= GetNumberOfChannels()) return 0.;
00012   /* Don't access out of bounds! */
00013   return (*((Float_t*) (record + 2*channel + 2)));
00014   /* packed float into a 32-bit word. */
00015 }
00016 
00017 UInt_t ORBocTIC3Decoder::GetTimeOfChannel(UInt_t* record, UInt_t channel) 
00018 {
00019   if (channel >= GetNumberOfChannels()) return 0;
00020   /* Don't access out of bounds! */
00021   return (record[2*channel + 3]);
00022 }

00024 
00025 std::string ORBocTIC3Decoder::GetParName(size_t iPar)
00026 {
00027   switch(iPar) {
00028     case 0:
00029       return "Device ID";
00030     case 1:
00031       return "Channel";
00032     case 2:
00033       return "Pressure";
00034     case 3:
00035       return "Time";
00036   }
00037   ORLog(kError) << "Parameter number out of bounds" << std::endl;
00038   return "";
00039 }
00040 
00041 UInt_t ORBocTIC3Decoder::GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow)
00042 {
00043   switch (iPar) {
00044     case 0:
00045       return GetDeviceID(record);
00046     case 1:
00047       return (UInt_t)iRow;
00048     case 2:
00049       return (UInt_t)GetPressureOfChannel(record, iRow);
00050     case 3:
00051       return GetTimeOfChannel(record, iRow);
00052   }
00053   ORLog(kError) << "Parameter number out of bounds" << std::endl;
00054   return 0;
00055 }
00056 
00057 void ORBocTIC3Decoder::Dump(UInt_t* record)
00058 {
00059   ORLog(kDebug) << "*************** Dumping out data *************" << std::endl;
00060   ORLog(kDebug) << "Number of Channels: " << GetNumberOfChannels() << std::endl;
00061   for (size_t i=0; i<GetNumberOfChannels();i++) {
00062     ORLog(kDebug) << "Channel: " << i << std::endl
00063       << " Pressure: " << GetPressureOfChannel(record, i) << std::endl
00064       << " Time: " << GetTimeOfChannel(record, i) << std::endl;
00065   }
00066   ORLog(kDebug) << "********************************************************" << std::endl;
00067 }
